pull.title: Speedy trial activation parameters for Taproot
pull.body: Adds the activation parameters for taproot as specified in https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/1104

events.body: Concept NACK. Devs have no authority to make consensus changes against community consensus.
Maybe include the (expected) dates as comments? That's been done in the past, see #8937. ACK otherwise.

> Maybe include the (expected) dates as comments? That's been done in the past, see #8937. ACK otherwise.

Done.

events.message: Add mainnet and testnet taproot activation params

events.body:
> Concept NACK. Devs have no authority to make consensus changes against community consensus.

Note that luke-jr is [on the record](http://gnusha.org/uasf/2021-03-02.log) as committing to NACK lot=false proposals in general, in accordance with his [list post on the topic](https://lists.linuxfoundation.org/pipermail/bitcoin-dev/2021-February/018498.html):

> 11:08 < luke-jr> personally I plan to NACK any LOT=False; but I doubt I would need to at this point (devs pushing against LOT=True seem to be off shed-painting other bad ideas now)
> 12:42 < hashcash> make a PR for core with LOT=false
> 12:42 < luke-jr> hashcash: I will NACK it

ACK f979b32
in it matches the BIP draft

ACK f979b3237f1cfc28f9c4ccb07beab558d5357a55
Fancy PGP signature
